documentation.text:
@dev GetDaysToVest
 returns the number of days the contract is set to vest in.

@dev SetEmployeeVested marks an employee as being vested.  This is usually for founders of the company.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev CheckEmployeeVested Return true if the employee is vested.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev GetName - return the name of the employee.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev GetStartDate return the start date in unix timesamp format.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev DaysEmployeed Calculate number of days emploeed.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev IsVested returns true if employee is fully vested.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev ProportionVested returns the current proprtion of vesting that the employee has in number of tokens.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

documentation.text:
@dev GetDaysToVest
 returns the number of days the contract is set to vest in.

@dev SetEmployeeVested marks an employee as being vested.  This is usually for founders of the company.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev CheckEmployeeVested Return true if the employee is vested.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev GetName - return the name of the employee.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev GetStartDate return the start date in unix timesamp format.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev DaysEmployeed Calculate number of days emploeed.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev IsVested returns true if employee is fully vested.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

@dev ProportionVested returns the current proprtion of vesting that the employee has in number of tokens.
 @param _acct the employees ethereum account number.

devdoc.details: Combining a simple ERC20 token with an employee vesting plan.  Employees are vested for ownership over a 4 year period.  This is done on a per-day basis.   If the employee leaves the company before the 4 years they loose all vested tokens.  Each employee gets a percentage of ownership (1/4th pect, 1/2pct).

CheckEmployeeVested(address).details: CheckEmployeeVested Return true if the employee is vested.

DaysEmployeed(address).details: DaysEmployeed Calculate number of days emploeed.

EmployeeSeparation(address).details: EmployeeSeparation Employee leaves the company.  If employee is not vested then all stock (tokens) are lost.

GetDaysToVest().details: GetDaysToVest returns the number of days the contract is set to vest in.

GetName(address).details: GetName - return the name of the employee.

GetStartDate(address).details: GetStartDate return the start date in unix timesamp format.

IsVested(address).details: IsVested returns true if employee is fully vested.

ProportionVested(address).details: ProportionVested returns the current proprtion of vesting that the employee has in number of tokens.

SetEmployeeVested(address).details: SetEmployeeVested marks an employee as being vested.  This is usually for founders of the company.

StartVest(address,string,uint256).details: StartVest is called when an employee starts and sets the beiginning date to the current block number time.

params._tvest: the percentage times 1 million of the stock that the employee receives.

StartVestDate(address,string,uint256,uin.details: StartVestDate is called when an employee starts and sets the beiginning date to the current block number time.

params._startDate: the date that the employee was hired on in unix timestamp format.  Seconds since 1970.
params._tvest: the percentage times 1 million of the stock that the employee receives.

constructor.details: Constructor that saves msg.sender (owner), total tokens and vesting time  with a default vesting of 4 years if _daysToVest is passed as 0.

params._daysToVest: number days before employee is considered vested.

devdoc.title: EmployeeVest
